title: Apple Watch gets a new name, new CPU and a smaller price tag | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Apple watch series
1](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)

**Apple has just announced the Apple Watch Series 2, but it hasn’t abandoned
the original[Apple Watch](https://www.trustedreviews.com/apple-watch-
review).**

Instead of being relegated to the past, the first-generation Apple Watch will
remain on sale, repositioned as the junior model in the new Apple Watch range.
It’s getting a new name, too: Apple Watch Series 1.

It’s also receiving an upgrade, and will feature the same dual-core processor
as the Apple Watch Series 2, which will make it 50% faster. Sadly, the Series
1 won’t have the waterproofing capabilities of the Series 2, so you won’t be
able to take it swimming.

**Related:[Apple Watch 2: 7 things you need to know right
now](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-watch-2-release-date-rumours-
price-news-battery-life)**

The Apple Watch Series 1 has a lower price tag of £269/$269. Pre-orders begin
on Friday 9 September.
